task.title: View Visit Information from the Customer or Account Springboard

context.p: You can view visits associated with a customer or account from the Customer or Account springboards, respectively.
To view visit information for a customer or account:

step.cmd: Access the appropriate Customer or Account springboard.
View the Visits tab (under Letters). A list of active and historical visits for the customer is displayed.
Click the hyperlink in the Visit column. The Visit springboard is displayed.
